title: Orleans Parish Coroner identifies Milan murder victim
content:
The man shot to death Thursday evening (Aug. 11) in the Milan neighborhood has been identified by the Orleans Parish Coroner as 17-year-old Sam Dyson.
The shooting happened around 5:20 p.m. in the 2200 block of Peniston Street.
Anyone with information about this shooting should call Detective Maggie McCourt at 504-658-5300.
There was a fatal shooting Thursday evening (Aug. 11) in the 2200 block of Peniston Street, according to the NOPD.
